name: Kill The Cute
description:
Hordes of Cutelings will come after you and they are only after one thing. Cuddles! You better shoot them in the face before that happens!



You're the Villain!
In this fast-paced Roguelite you will try to survive 30 to 90 second rounds and each round is a random map which have its own challenges like swamps, booby traps, toxic rivers, freezing colds etc.

Unique Characters
20+ Characters have their own unique weapons, stats and special skills. Each Character offers a diffrent gaming experience. Complete Challenges in diffrent game difficulties and unlock all the Characters!

Meta Progression
Death is not the end! Upgrade the weapons of your favorite characters and spend the skill points on your Skill Tree as you like. Come back stronger and Kill The Cute again and again!
